errors.error_description: The command to start the development server uses an invalid parameter `--port 8000`. The correct syntax does not use the `--port` flag.
correction_candidates: Change the command to `python3 manage.py runserver 8000`.
Change the command to `python3 manage.py runserver -p 8000`.
Change the command to `python3 manage.py runserver --port=8000`.
Change the command to `python3 manage.py startserver --port 8000`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to `python3 manage.py runserver 8000`.
